com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class RecurringTask

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord
        |
        +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.RecurringTask
public class RecurringTask
extends com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord

This class represents the Recurring Task Record as found in an MPX file.

getRecurranceType

public byte getRecurranceType()
Refers to the 'This Occurs..' box of the MSP Recurring Task infobox. The options are :- 1 - DAILY, 4-WEEKLY , 8-MONTHLY , 16 - YEARLY
Returns:
- byte representing type

setRecurranceType

public void setRecurranceType(byte val)

Parameters:
val - - byte representing type

getLengthRadioIndex

public int getLengthRadioIndex()
Gets the selection in Length Options box. Top option - to a specific date. Value 1 Bottom option - no of occurances. value 0
Returns:
value of this option set

setLengthRadioIndex

public void setLengthRadioIndex(java.lang.Integer val)
Sets the selection in Length Options box. Top option - to a specific date. Value 1 Bottom option - no of occurances. value 0
Parameters:
val - value of this option set

getDailyBoxRadioIndex

public byte getDailyBoxRadioIndex()
Referring to the 2 radio buttons in the 'Daily' option box of the MSP Recurring Task infobox. The top option (Day) = 0 . The bottom option (Workday) = 1
Returns:
- byte, values as above

setDailyBoxRadioIndex

public void setDailyBoxRadioIndex(java.lang.Byte val)

Parameters:
val - - byte, values as above

getWeeklyBoxDayOfWeekIndex

public java.lang.String getWeeklyBoxDayOfWeekIndex()
Refers to the 'Weekly' option boxes of the MSP Recurring Task infobox. This is an index of days of the week and is represented as a 7 digit string of 0/1 values. The string is eg '0010010' if 'Tue' and 'Fri' are selected
Returns:
- String

setWeeklyBoxDayOfWeekIndex

public void setWeeklyBoxDayOfWeekIndex(java.lang.String val)
Refers to the 'Weekly' option boxes of the MSP Recurring Task infobox. This is an index of days of the week and is represented as a 7 digit string of 0/1 values. The string is eg '0010010' if 'Tue' and 'Fri' are selected
Parameters:
val - - String list of day values
See Also:
frequency constants

getMonthlyBoxRadioIndex

public byte getMonthlyBoxRadioIndex()
Refers to the 'Monthly' option boxes of the MSP Recurring Task infobox. The top option (Day x of...) = 0 . The bottom option (The Xth day of...) = 1
Returns:
- 0 or 1

getMonthlyBoxBottomRadioFrequencyComboIndex

public int getMonthlyBoxBottomRadioFrequencyComboIndex()
Refers to the 'Monthly' option boxes of the MSP Recurring Task infobox. If the bottom radio button is selected (eg. The 3rd Tuesday), this value is the content of the 'Every...' combo box. eg 'Every 5th Month'

CONSTANTS eg 'Every 7th','Every Other','Every'

getYearlyBoxDate

public java.util.Date getYearlyBoxDate()
Refers to the 'Yearly' option boxes of the MSP Recurring Task infobox. This is the date shown when the top radio button is selected. eg 11 December. This represents the first scheduled occurance of this RecurringTask
Returns:
- Date in box

getParent

public MPXFile getParent()
Accessor method allowing retreival of MPXFile reference.

reference to this MPXFile
